details.source_text: DOHA, QATAR - Luis Enrique was replaced by Luis de la Fuente as Spain's coach on Thursday, two days after the national team was eliminated in the round of 16 at the World Cup.

details.source_text: Luis Enrique had said he wasn't planning to relinquish the ï¿½tiki-takaï¿½ if he remained as coach, and De la Fuente also is likely to keep it alive.
details.reused_text: His time as Spain coach was characterised by a firm commitment to maintaining possession.
